## Patrick

-   I am a twin ! My twin brother's name is Colin and he lives in Chicago.

-   My favorite places on the planet are river confluences. These three places are...

    -   The confluence of the Snake River and the Salmon River (Oregon/Idaho)

    -   The confluence of Green River and the Yampa River

    -   The Confluence of the Middle for of the Salmon with the Salmon (Idaho)

-   I went to college in Spokane, Washington.

-   My favorite books are *The Name of the Wind* by Patrick Rothufus, *All the Light We Cannot See* by Anthony Doer, and *A Sand County Almanac* by Aldo Leopold.
